short_summary: One (1) Intermediate (level 2) Life Cycle Management Specialist
tags: World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
full_summary:
**Tender Announcement**
The Department of National Defence (DND) is issuing a bid solicitation for the provision of one (1) Intermediate Life Cycle Management Specialist (LCMS). The LCMS will provide support to the Directorate of Aerospace Equipment Business Management (DAEBM) 2, located in Gatineau, QC.

**Procurement Information**
The solicitation number is W8485-TSPS2023-09/B, and the closing date is February 17, 2023, at 14:00 Eastern Standard Time (EST). The tender is available for download from the Government Electronic Tendering System (GETS).

**Background**
This bid solicitation is a re-issuance of a previous solicitation, W8485-TSPS2023-09/A, which was closed on October 7, 2022. The requirement is only open to pre-qualified suppliers under the Task and Solutions Professional Services (TSPS) Method of Supply.

**Criteria**
The successful bidder must have a Secret security clearance and meet the required qualifications outlined in the Request for Proposal (RFP) documents.

**Task Scope**
The LCMS will work on a task-based approach, with an estimated level of effort of 240 days per resource per year. The contract is intended to be awarded for a period of two (2) years, with three (3) irrevocable option years allowing Canada to extend the term of the contract.

**Request for Proposal (RFP) Documents**
RFP documents will be e-mailed directly to pre-qualified suppliers. Bidders are advised that RFP documents are not available on GETS.

**List of Pre-qualified Suppliers**
The following organizations are invited to submit a proposal:

* 7351933 Canada Inc
* 9468269 Canada Corp
* ACF Associates Inc
* ADGA Group Consultants Inc
* A dirondack Information Management Inc.
* (Joint Venture) The AIM Group Inc.
* Altis Human Resources (Ottawa) Inc
* Arup Canada Inc
* Calian Ltd
* Deloitte Inc
* Fleetway Inc
* IPSS INC
* L-3 Technologies MAS Inc
* Maverin Business Services Inc
* MaxSys Staffing & Consulting Inc
* Modis Canada Inc
* Norda Stelo Inc
* Olav Consulting Corp
* (Joint Venture) MOHWA Aboriginal Information Technology Corporation
* Pennant Canada Limited
* Platinum Technologies Inc
* Procom
